snippet: A juxtaposition of court sessions raised new alarms that Egypt was turning back to its old authoritarian ways.
abstract: Egyptian court orders the release on bail of Ahmed Ezz, steel tycoon and right-hand man to former Pres Hosni Mubarak, while another court considers a prison sentence handed to three young organizers who led revolt against Mubarak; juxtaposition of court sessions raises new alarms that the country is turning back to its old authoritarian ways.
lead_paragraph: A juxtaposition of court sessions raised new alarms that Egypt was turning back to its old authoritarian ways.

headline.main: Egypt Tycoon Is Released; 3 Detainees Detail Abuse
headline.print_headline: Egypt Tycoon Is Released; 3 Detainees Detail Abuse
